name: Slotterz
description:
This project was created for the Godot Wild Game Jam.  The theme being 'Seven' I this idea popped into my mind. 

It was made more clear to do a slot when one of the optional wild cards was to add a random aspect to it.

I made most of the assets, the ambiance that you can hear a little bit of in the background was Royalty Free. But other than that everything was made by me <3
